amendment.description: An amendment numbered 35 printed in House Report 118-158 to prohibit the VA from using funds to submit a beneficiary's name to the NICS list based on VA's appointment of a fiduciary.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the Department of Veterans Affairs from using funds to submit a beneficiary's name to the NICS list based on Veterans Affairs' appointment of a fiduciary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 206 (Roll no. 373).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Bost.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 206 (Roll no. 373).
